1.title: Quite as a Whisper
1.plot: It's time to get quite with some Barnes 300 AAC Blackout VOR-TX rifle ammo and the new line of silencers from Sig Sauer. Also, the new Model 9T 9mm rifle from Stag Arms; new finishes for your favorite Smith and Wesson M&P pistols; and what it means to be "Condition Crimson".

2.title: Clean Sweep
2.plot: It's a full line of gun lubes, including the popular EWL, from Slip2000. Plus, Safari ammo from DoubleTap Ammunition; the Ruger American Rimfire; a Crimson Trace Training Tip; Timney Trigger's Ruger American trigger; and more.

3.title: The New 28 Nosler
3.plot: It's the new 28 Nosler cartridge, and cool upgrades to the M1A rifle from Springfield Armory. Plus, Ruger's new compact pistols; the Mini-Tuck from CrossBreed Holsters; a Pro Tip from Winchester; and LaserLyte's Training Barrel for GLOCK pistols.

4.title: Mix and Match
4.plot: It's a quick switch with LaserLyte's Laser Body/Master Module kit for SCCY pistols. Plus, Ruger's family of American Rifles; the competition-ready Model 3T-M rifle from Stag Arms; DoubleTap Ammunition's DT Long Range ammo; a full line of green lasers from Crimson Trace; and Sig Sauer P320 modular pistol.

5.title: Smooth Operator
5.plot: It's easy shooting with the Springfield Armory Operator 1911s. Plus, accessories for your Stag Arms ARs; LaserLyte's "Mighty Mouse" laser; suppressed options from Smith and Wesson; and range-ready AR ammo from Barnes Bullets, and more.

6.title: Concealed Carry Laser Options
6.plot: There's a laser for that - It's Crimson Trace lasers for popular carry models. Plus, Smith and Wesson Ported Pistols and CORE Pistols from the Performance Center; the Stag Arms 9L rifle; a Winchester Pro Tip; and more.

7.title: Straight from Slovakia
7.plot: We're looking at Grand Power's P45 with rotating barrel, and their K100 9mm today. Plus, Ruger's AR-556 direct impingement rifle, and new "452" AR drop-in trigger; Ballistic Tip Ammunition from Nosler; CrossBreed Holsters Appendix Carry holster options; and Sig Sauer's complete line of optics.

8.title: Trigger X-change
8.plot: It's an easy upgrade to your favorite Ruger 10-22 -the BX-Trigger. Plus, cool new designs for the Mossberg .22LR Blaze rifles; the Crimson Trace Rail Masters lasers and light; some great 1911s from STI; Smith and Wesson handguns equipped with Crimson Trace lasers; and tips from Winchester and Mossberg.

9.title: Pistol Power
9.plot: Ready to go, right out of the box, the new Smith and Wesson pistols with LaserMax lasers are a great addition to your home. Plus, Springfield Armory's .45 and 9mm 1911 RO Compacts; Stag Arms' competition-ready Model 3T; Mossberg's Patriot rifle; and supreme gun cleaning with Slip2000.

10.title: Optics, Optics, Optics!
10.plot: It's a one-stop shop for a variety of optics options at OpticsPlanet.com. Plus, a Remington 700 trigger from Timney Triggers; Barnes Bullets' Precision Match ammunition; a lightweight Gunsite Scout Rifle from Ruger; Sig Sauer's MCX and 716 G2 rifles; and a Guns and Gear challenge using the LaserLyte Score Tyme Target and Trigger Tyme pistol.

11.title: Optics, Ammo, and Rifles... Oh My!
11.plot: It's the new line of smart HD optics from ATN, including the BinoX digital binoculars and their X-Sight scope. Plus, more than 30 caliber offerings from the Sig Sauer Ammunition line; Mossberg's extension of the MVP rifle family; cool features of the Smith and Wesson M&P 10; managing recoil with Winchester's W "Train and Defend" line of ammunition, and more.

12.title: Fully-Assembled Favorite
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Handgun Hunting
13.plot: It doesn't get much cooler than handgun hunter loads from DoubleTap Ammunition. Plus, the new Smith and Wesson SW22 Victory sport pistol; Springfield Armory's XD Mod.2 - now in .45 ACP; CrossBreed Holsters original IWB holster, the SuperTuck; Ruger's LCR revolver in 9mm, and new LCRx with external hammer; and a Crimson Trace Training Tip.
